description: Set integer value in Bill field.
expected: Bill field shows value 3.

description: Set float value with 2 decimals in Bill field
expected: After step 1, Bill field shows value 3.3 and after step 2 the field shows 3.33.

description: Bill field input changes separator from comma to dot
expected: After typing comma, it is changed to dot. Bill field shows value 3.3.

description: Try to input more than one decimal separator in Bill field
expected: After step 1, Bill field shows value 3.3. After step 2, second decimal separator is not inserted. Bill field still shows value 3.3.

description: Try to set float value with more than 2 decimals in Bill field
expected: After 2 decimals, other decimals cannot be typed. Bill field shows value 3.33.

description: Try to set value higher than 99 999.99
steps: Start typing with .99 and then type 9s (9.99 -> 99.99 -> 999.99 ...)
expected: Max value of the field is 99 999.99. After step 2 field shows 10 000. After step 4 field shows 99 999.99, another digits are not inserted.

description: Try to set string value in Bill field
expected: Only digits are allowed. Bill field empty. Invalid characters are not typed into field.

description: Set value 0 in Bill field
expected: Bill field requires number higher than 0. After typing field gets a red frame. Field shows 0.

description: Try to set negative value in Bill field
expected: Character '-' is not allowed. The value shows 1.

description: Remove red frame after clearing field or setting to positive.
expected: After steps 2 and 4 the field gets a red frame (invalid value). After changing field to valid value (positive or empty) frame is removed.

description: Set a tip button active.
expected: After clicking a button, the button will change the background to turquoise.

description: Remove active state from a button after clicking another button.
expected: After step 1 active button is 5%. After clicking 10% button, 5% button is no longer active. 10% tip button becomes the active one.

description: Clicking the active button
expected: Clicking the active button will keep it active.

description: Set integer value in custom tip input
expected: Custom input field shows value 55. Field is active (turquoise background).

description: Set string value in custom tip input
expected: Only digits are allowed. Field is empty and not active.

description: Set floating value in custom tip input
expected: Only digits are allowed. Field shows 305 and is active.

description: Set value higher than 999 in custom tip input
expected: Field has limit to 3 digits. Field shows 999.

description: Remove active state after clearing the custom tip input
expected: After step 2 field gets active. Clearing value removes active state.

description: Remove active state from a button after inserting the custom tip
expected: After step 1, tip button 15% is active. Inserting custom input value removes active state from any tip buttons. Custom input becomes active.

description: Keep active state on tip button if inserted custom tip is invalid
expected: If custom tip input is invalid (empty), previously active tip button stays active.

description: Set integer value in Number of people field.
expected: Number of people field shows 2.

description: Try to set float value in Number of people field
expected: Only positive integers allowed. Other characters will be omitted. The field shows value 35.

description: Try to set value higher than 999 in Number of people field
expected: Max value is 999. Digits exceeding 999 are not inserted.

description: Try to set string value in Number of people field
expected: Only digits are allowed. Field empty. Invalid characters are not typed.

description: Set 0 or negative value in Number of people field
expected: Both 0 and -1 are invalid. Field gets red frame. Field shows typed values.

description: Remove red frame after clearing the field or changing to positive integer
expected: After step 2 and 4 frame is added (invalid values). Steps 3 and 5 remove the frame.

description: Field Total shows $0.00 if not all fields are filled
steps: Set bill field value: 100 (leave tip section and number of people empty)
Set number of people field value: 2 (leave bill and tip section empty)
Click tip button 10% (leave bill and number of people empty)
Set custom tip input value: 15 (leave bill and number of people empty)
Try other combinations of filling 2 fields and leaving one empty
expected: After each step field Total shows $0.00. All fields must be filled to calculate total tip.

description: Field Total is calculated after filling all fields (Number of people last filled)
steps: Set number of people field value: 2
expected: After filling all fields, field Total shows $110.00.

description: Field Total is calculated after filling all fields (Tip section last filled - button)
steps: Set number of people field value: 4
expected: After filling all fields, field Total shows $55.00

description: Field Total is calculated after filling all fields (Tip section last filled - custom tip input)
steps: Set number of people field value: 4
expected: After filling all fields, field Total shows $65.00

description: Field Total shows 2 decimals
steps: Set Number of people field value to: 3
expected: After filling all fields, field Total shows $16.40. The actual value is 16.3989, but field Total ceil value to 2 decimals.

description: Changing any field after all fields are filled recalculates Total
steps: Set number of people field value: 2
Change Number of people field value to: 4
expected: After step 3 field Total shows $110.00. After step 4 field Total shows $220.00. After step 5 field Total shows $210.00. After step 6 field Total shows $210.00.

description: Changing any field to invalid or empty value after all fields are filled sets Total to $0.00
steps: Set number of people field value: 2
Set Number of people field value to: 0
expected: After step 3 field Total shows $110.00. After step 4 field Total shows $0.00. After step 5 field Total still shows $0.00. After step 6 field Total shows $110.00 again. After step 7 field Total shows $0.00. After step 8 field Total still shows $0.00.

description: Field Total per person shows $0.00 if not all fields are filled
steps: Set bill field value: 100 (leave tip section and number of people empty)
Set number of people field value: 2 (leave bill and tip section empty)
Click tip button 10% (leave bill and number of people empty)
Set custom tip input value: 15 (leave bill and number of people empty)
Try other combinations of filling 2 fields and leaving one empty
expected: After each step field Total per person shows $0.00. All fields must be filled to calculate total per person.

description: Field Total per person is calculated after field Total calculation
steps: Set number of people field value: 2
expected: After filling all fields, field Total per person shows $145.00 / 2 = $72.50.

description: Field Total per person shows 2 decimals
steps: Set Number of people field value to: 3
expected: After filling all fields, field Total per person shows $16.40 / 3 = $5.47. The actual value is 5.4663, but field Total per person ceils value to 2 decimals.

description: Changing any field after all fields are filled recalculates Total per person
steps: Set number of people field value: 2
Change Number of people field value to: 4
expected: After step 3 field Total per person shows $110.00 / 2 = $55.00. After step 4 field Total per person shows $220.00 / 2 = $110.00. After step 5 field Total per person shows $210.00 / 2 = $105.00. After step 6 field Total per person shows $210.00 / 4 = $52.50.

description: Changing any field to invalid or empty value after all fields are filled sets Total per person to $0.00
steps: Set number of people field value: 2
Set Number of people field value to: 0
expected: After step 3 field Total per person shows $55.00. After step 4 field Total per person shows $0.00. After step 5 field Total per person still shows $0.00. After step 6 field Total per person shows $55.00 again. After step 7 field Total per person shows $0.00. After step 8 field Total per person still shows $0.00.

description: Field Tip amount per person shows $0.00 if not all fields are filled
steps: Set Bill field value to: 100 (leave tip section and number of people empty)
Set number of people field value: 2 (leave bill and tip section empty)
Click tip button 10% (leave bill and number of people empty)
Set custom tip input value: 15 (leave bill and number of people empty)
Try other combinations of filling 2 fields and leaving one empty
expected: After each step field Tip amount per person shows $0.00. All fields must be filled to calculate tip amount per person.

description: Field Tip amount per person is calculated after field Total calculation
steps: Set number of people field value: 2
expected: After filling all fields, field Tip amount per person shows $45.00 / 2 = $22.50.

description: Field Tip amount per person shows 2 decimals
steps: Set Number of people field value to: 3
expected: After filling all fields, field Tip amount per person shows $4.07 / 3 = $1.36. The actual value is 1.3566, but field Tip amount per person ceils value to 2 decimals.

description: Changing any field after all fields are filled recalculates Tip amount per person
steps: Set number of people field value: 2
Change Number of people field value to: 4
expected: After step 3 field Tip amount per person shows $10.00 / 2 = $5.00. After step 4 field Tip amount per person shows $20.00 / 2 = $10.00. After step 5 field Tip amount per person shows $10.00 / 2 = $5.00. After step 6 field Tip amount per person shows $10.00 / 4 = $2.50.

description: Reset button restores all fields default values
steps: Set number of people field value: 2
expected: After step 3 field Total shows $110.00 and field Total per person shows $55.00. After clicking Reset button, all fields are cleared, tip buttons and custom input are not active, fields of tip calculation show $0.00.

description: Reset button is enabled without all fields filled
steps: Without filling any fields, click Reset button
Set Bill field value: 100, then click Reset button
Set number of people field value: 2, then click Reset button
Click tip button 10%, then click Reset button
Set custom tip input value: 15, then click Reset button
expected: In all steps, clicking Reset button clears all fields, tip buttons and custom input are not active, fields of tip calculation show $0.00.

description: Test cases are loaded from external JSON file
steps: Clear cache and hard reload page
Open dev tools and go to Network tab
Check if test-cases.json file is loaded
expected: After step 2, test cases page is opened in new tab. After step 4, in Network tab test-cases.json file is visible with status 200. After step 5, test cases are generated again with status 304.

description: Splitter app is responsive
steps: Open dev tools and go to responsive mode
expected: App is properly displayed on all screen sizes. There is no horizontal scroll. All elements are properly aligned. In mobile view (up to 425px width) tip buttons are in 2 rows and calculation section is below input section.
